scripts.build: npm run build:img & npm run build:sound
scripts.build:img: mkdirp build/img && ncp src/img/dungeontileset-ii/v1.3/tiles build/img/dungeontileset-ii && ncp src/img/rltiles build/img/rltiles
scripts.build:sound: mkdirp build/sound && ncp src/sound/amaranta-music build/sound/amaranta-music && ncp src/sound/boxcat-games-nameless build/sound/boxcat-games-nameless && ncp src/sound/lexin-music build/sound/lexin-music && ncp src/sound/effects build/sound/effects
